mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(balance), 0) FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND category IN ('입출금', '예적금', '투자', '연금', '기타')
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(last_month_balance), 0) FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND category IN ('입출금', '예적금', '투자', '연금', '기타')
SELECT category, SUM(balance) AS balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY category
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS accountsCount, SUM(balance) AS amount FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY category
SELECT bank_name AS bankName, account_name AS accountName, account_number AS accountNumber, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND category = #{category}
SELECT ua.bank_name AS bankName, ua.account_name AS accountName, ua.account_number AS accountNumber FROM user_accounts ua WHERE ua.user_id = #{userId} AND ua.account_number = #{accountNum} LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL(ut.description3, '') AS transactionName, -- ← 여기만 변경 DATE_FORMAT(ut.transaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS transactionDate, CASE WHEN ut.transaction_time IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN SECOND(ut.transaction_time) = 0 THEN DATE_FORMAT(ut.transaction_time, '%H:%i') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(ut.transaction_time, '%H:%i:%s') END AS transactionTime, ut.amount AS amount FROM user_transactions ut JOIN user_accounts ua ON ua.id = ut.account_id WHERE ua.user_id = #{userId} AND ua.account_number = #{accountNum} ORDER BY ut.transaction_date DESC, ut.transaction_time DESC
